Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took three wickets for only 14 runs
Rohit Sharma's team battled their way to victory
Pakistan needed 18 runs to win off the final over but could only score 11
Pre-Game Insights: More than 400 million people worldwide were expected to watch the game
The India-supporting crowd created a raucous atmosphere
Indian fans in the stands were praised by the team captain
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma described Bumrah as 'a genius with the ball'
He said India want Bumrah ‘to be in that mindset for the whole World Cup’
Rohit Sharma praised the support from Indian fans
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium
The result means India are extremely likely to qualify for the Super Eight phase
This was the first time the USA have competed in the T20 World Cup
